{"id":1237953948,"question_id":3408,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1713677277,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1237953948/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count the Number of Special Characters I","memory":"42.4 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    public int numberOfSpecialChars(String word) {\n        boolean[] lowercase = new boolean[26];\n        boolean[] uppercase = new boolean[26];\n        int count = 0;\n\n        for (char ch : word.toCharArray()) {\n            if (Character.isLowerCase(ch)) {\n                lowercase[ch - 'a'] = true;\n            } else if (Character.isUpperCase(ch)) {\n                uppercase[ch - 'A'] = true;\n            }\n        }\n\n        for (int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {\n            if (lowercase[i] && uppercase[i]) {\n                count++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return count;\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-the-number-of-special-characters-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
